owuan, a sturdy sterilized bull was selected as a fertility indicator since it‚Äôs difficult to know when rhinos are fertile. 

through him, scientists will get the signal to perform the northern white rhino embryo transfer into the southern surrogates.

over time, the natural traits became more prominent - even motivating the northern whites to begin mating. 

when it was discovered that the northern white rhinos couldn‚Äôt carry a calf to term due to health issues, southern white rhino females were chosen as surrogates.
